definition: to flow steadily/direct current (DC)
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

direct current

sentences.english: Turn the dc meters switch to TR1.
The proposition in this paper is also suitable for once-through boiler.
sentences.chinese: 本文所討論的內容也適用於直流鍋爐。

sentences.english: If the electric field added is unchangeable , what produces is the direct current.
sentences.chinese: 如果所加的電場不變，產生的是直流電。

sentences.english: The propeller turns a small d. c. generator .
sentences.chinese: 螺旋槳帶動一個小型直流發電機。

sentences.english: Available either single or double solenoid, AC or DC operated with aluminum bodies.
sentences.chinese: 可無論是單或雙線圈，交流或直流操作與鋁體。

sentences.english: For the HVDC power transmission project from the Three Gorges Hydropower Station to Guangdong an appropriate ice-melting countermeasure should be considered.
sentences.chinese: 三廣直流工程的直流線路必須考慮合適的防冰對策。

sentences.english: For the HVDC power transmission project from the Three Gorges Hydropower Station to Guangdong an appropriate ice-melting countermeasure should be considered.
sentences.chinese: 三廣直流工程的直流線路必須考慮合適的防冰對策。

sentences.english: It is obvious th at A. C. motors are superior to D. C. motors in many appli cations.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，交流電機在許多應用場合比直流電機優越。

sentences.english: The results of simulation and DC test for DVD OPIC are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中給出模擬結果及芯片直流測試結果。

sentences.english: Commutation failure is one of the most common failures for the high voltage direct current transmission system .
sentences.chinese: 在特高壓直流輸電中換相失敗也是主要的故障。

sentences.english: DC 1500V cable is one of the key devices for the safety operation of subway system.
sentences.chinese: 直流1500V電纜是保障地鐵正常運行的關鍵設施。

sentences.english: During choose the direct current power supply, pay attention to the negative and positive.
sentences.chinese: 選用直流供電時，注意正負極標識。

sentences.english: Make sure that the dc ammeter indication increases approximately 5 amperes.
sentences.chinese: 確保直流電流表指示升高大約5安培。

sentences.english: The arc extinguishing principle of miniature circuit breaker in DC circuits was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了小型交流斷路器在直流電路中的滅弧原理。

sentences.english: Input voltage peak limited to 600V for DC and low frequency.
sentences.chinese: 對直流和低頻輸入電壓的峯值上限爲600伏。

sentences.english: The methods were discussed to design the speed governing system of DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 詳細討論了直流電機調速系統的工程設計方法。
